name: 數位動畫設計
description: 本課程主要是著重在訓練同學動畫製作的觀念與流程，首先培養學生運用單格繪製或拍攝的手法來完成動畫的基礎操作與練習，透過手繪動畫與偶動畫的練習能更了解動畫的本質與製作，使學生暸解動畫動作的分割與時間的掌控。之後藉由教授電腦動畫製作軟體After Effect、Flash…等軟體的操作，建立學生正確的動畫製作概念。
goals: 訓練同學動畫製作的觀念與流程
培養學生運用單格繪製或拍攝的手法來完成動畫的基礎操作與練習
了解動畫的本質與製作
暸解動畫動作的分割與時間的掌控
建立學生正確的動畫製作概念
syllabus:
"Digital Animation Design '' explores the arts and knowledge of digital animation. It features hands-on experience of production for purposes of art and design, with techniques such as stop motion, hand drawing, or experimental techniques. The course comprises 3 parts:  
The 1st part explores fundamental concepts, tools and techniques, such as table drawing, 2D animation with Adobe Photoshop.  
The 2nd part explores wider concepts, workflows, and techniques that work around with digital animation, especially the application to new media.  
The 3rd part focuses on creative content developments by completing a project-oriented production for each student or group with those techniques acquainted from the previous.
